ada wana wita eya sidu kirimata hakiyawak ithiri kara gannata tharaga kari lowa thula hakiyawak minisata natha.namuth me wishwaye kothanaka ho manasika jana sanniwedanaya haduna gath eya wadi diyunu kala pirisak sitiya hakiya .eya ek thanaka nowa thani thaniwa wiya haka.obada minis manasak himi ayeku wana bawin yamak wataha ganima hamuwe mema karunu awaboda kara ganu atha.

“api wage me rate bahutharayak hodatama danne ekko sinhala nathinam demala .kotas welenda pola wani tharamaka sankirna welenda polaka aayojanaya kirimedi api eewaye saba thaththwaya dana gatha yuthuyi.mehi niwedana ingrisiyen pamanak thibena nisa apita eewa nisi paridi therum ganna amaruyi.me nisa api wale watunu wara ananthayi.”

warthamanaye eksath jathika paksha nayakathwayata ranil wikramasinha mahatha nusudusu bawada sandahan kala hethema “iwasuwa athi nayakathwaya bhara ganna“ yayi sajith premadasa mahathagen illimak da kaleya.

nuthana thorathuru thakshana paddhathi sankirna minis sammishranayakin menma , jala ha drudanga matha rada pawathi.
